channel.title: Prezto on World of Forks
channel.description: Recent content in Prezto on World of Forks

item.title: Centos初始化2
item.description: proxychains-ng git clone https://github.com/rofl0r/proxychains-ng cd proxychains-ng ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc make make install make install-config # 生成配置文件 echo 'http 10.100.100.136 4411' >> /etc/proxychains.conf # 输入代理设置 TMUX CentOS的版本太老，手动编译最新版本 yum install ncurses-devel libevent-devel curl -L https://github.com/tmux/tmux/releases/download/2.3/tmux-2.3.tar.gz | tar xz cd tmux-2.3 ./configure make make
